section.title: tmplsql web site
section.para: tmplsql is a C++ library for type safe access to the results from a relational database management system (RDMS)
The library may be downloaded from http://www.stitt.org/code/tmplsql/src/ Make sure you pick the tar.gz with the highest version number.
At the present it only supports Postgresql, however a Sybase version is defiantly in the works. It is relatively easy to add support for the RDMS of your choice by modifying the tmplsql::rdms class.
At the moment the only documentation for the library is generated by doxygen comments in the source code. It may be viewed at http://www.stitt.org/code/tmplsql/docs/
Please read the INSTALL file included in the source tar.gz file for brief install instructions.
There is an additional layer that I have written that goes above this library which creates sql queries 'on the fly', however I'm not entirely happy with it's design, and will add it when I am.
The library is Free Software, available under the terms of the Lesser General Public License. Take it and do to it what you will.
